name: Seamus Bear
description: Seamus is a fine fellow. He's all dressed up and ready to wade through piles of autumn leaves with you. He is made from soft blonde mohair with brown mohair inside his ears and velveteen pads. Stuffed with a combination of woodwool, glass beads and polyfibre with a very soft tummy. Amber glass eyes, embroidered freckles and a hand knitted scarf. Fully jointed and one of a kind. Woven 'Mymble & Co' label. Seamus was made in Wales. 8.5 inches tall. 1 of 1.

name: Geoffrey Bear
description: Geoffrey is the most marvellous colour of yellow which he he assures me is due to his love of honey. He is made from yellow mohair with brown felt pads. Stuffed with a combination of woodwool, glass beads and polyfibre with a very soft tummy. Green glass eyes, embroidered freckles and a hand knitted scarf. Fully jointed and one of a kind. Woven 'Mymble & Co' label. Geoffrey was made in Wales. 8.5 inches tall. 1 of 1.

name: Matti Bear
description: Matti Bear is based on a little 1930's bear that we found in a Stockholm flea market this summer. Pose him carefully and he even stands up all on his own! He is made from blond mohair with beige felt pads. Stuffed with a combination of woodwool, glass beads and polyfibre with a very soft tummy. Amber glass eyes, embroidered claws and features and a fancy hand knitted jumper. Fully jointed and one of a kind. Woven 'Mymble & Co' label. Matti was made in Wales. 9 inches tall. 1 of 1.

name: Pim Bear
description: Pim is such a tiny little thing at just 6 inches tall. He is made from black mohair with soft beige pads. Stuffed with a combination of glass beads and polyfibre with a very soft tummy. Black glass eyes backed with beige fel and a hand crocheted scarf. Fully jointed and one of a kind. Woven 'M' label. Pim was made in Wales. 6 inches tall. 1 of 1.

name: Mr Fox
description: Mr Fox is so called for his cunning nature and rather pointed little nose. He is made from golden mohair with brown felt pads. Stuffed with a combination of woodwool, glass beads and polyfibre with a very soft tummy. Black glass eyes, embroidered freckles and a hand knitted scarf. Fully jointed and one of a kind. Woven 'Mymble & Co' label. Mr Fox was made in Wales. 8.5 inches tall. 1 of 1.
